metadata.titleEn: Distribution dataset of prehistoric era ruins on the Tibetan Plateau and its surrounding areas
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原及周边地区史前时代遗址分布数据集
metadata.description:
This data is the distribution data of the prehistoric era sites on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau and surrounding areas, which is derived from the Supplementary Maps of the paper: Chen, F.H., Dong, G.H., Zhang, D.J., Liu, X.Y., Jia, X., An, C.B., Ma, M.M., Xie, Y.W., Barton, L., Ren, X.Y., Zhao, Z.J., & Wu, X.H. (2015). Agriculture facilitated permanent human occupation of the Tibetan Plateau after 3600 BP. SCIENCE, 347, 248-250.
The Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, with an average altitude of more than 4000m, is the highestand largest plateau all around the world, and also is one of the most unsuitable areas for human life with long-term on the earth. The remains at the archaeological site are direct evidences left behind the ancient human activities. The original data of this data is digitized from the results of 
the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau high-textual census and archaeological survey (Qinghai Volume and Tibet Volume of the Chinese Cultural Relics Atlas). The map was digitized mainly based on the distribution maps of the sites, and the latitude and longitude coordinates and altitude were obtained. a total of 6,950 sites, most of which are distributed in the northern part of the plateau. The age range of the site is between 7000BP and 2300BP. This data set is of reference value for the research on the process and power of human diffusion to the Tibetan Plateau in the prehistoric era and other studies related to human activities in the Tibetan Plateau and the prehistoric era.
metadata.descriptionCn: 该数据集为青藏高原及周边地区史前时代遗址分布数据，研究区主要为青藏高原及周边地区。青藏高原，平均海拔超过4000m，是世界上海拔最高、面积最大的高原，是地球上最不适宜人类长期生活的地区之一。考古遗址出土的遗存是古人类活动遗留下的直接证据。该数据集原始数据数字化自青藏高原文物普查和考古调查结果（中国文物地图集青海分册和西藏分册），主要根据其中的遗址分布地图进行了地图数字化，获取了经纬度坐标和海拔。遗址点共计6950处，大部分分布于高原北部地区，遗址的年代范围分布在7000BP至2300BP之间，遗址海拔分布在850m-5447m之间。本数据集对于研究史前时代人类向青藏高原扩散的过程与动力等与青藏高原、史前时代人类活动相关的研究具有参考价值。
metadata.instructions: The data is stored in a shapefile format. The data mainly includes the site number, longitude and latitude coordinates and site elevation, as well as the age range of the site.
metadata.instructionsCn: 数据以shapefile格式存储，数据主要包括了遗址点序号，经纬度坐标及遗址点海拔，还包括了遗址所属年代范围。

Agriculture facilitated permanent human occupation of the Tibetan Plateau after 3600 B.P. Science, 347( 6219) : 248-250.

国家文物局. (1996).《中国文物地图集青海分册》[M]. 北京:中国地图出版社.
国家文物局. (2010).《中国文物地图集西藏分册》[M]. 北京:文物出版社.

background: Ecological factors can place heavy constraints on humans, particularly in areas of high altitude, because even small changes in temperature, precipitation, and land cover can have a major effect on what crops can be grown. Early studies of the mechanisms underlying the spread of wheat and barley considered a single aspect of crop growth patterns: length of the growing season. In particular, models based on a crop’s accumulated heat requirements—growing degree days (GDD)—predict that wheat and barley are more adapted to growth in high-latitude and high-altitude Eurasia than millets. Local ecology and climate, coupled with crop phenology, thus had a marked impact on crop adoption in high-altitude environments, one that differed substantially from the lowlands.
research objective: We contend that this argument is incompatible with the growing requirements of barley. It is necessary to clearly define past crop niches to create better models for the complex history of the occupation of the plateau. Examination of the thermal niche occupied by barley on the NETP shows that growing barley at an altitude of 4000 m above sea level—aclaimmadeinChenetal. was unlikely to have been successful in the average year.
challenges: The potential for both hunter-gatherers and pastoralists to move grains outside of the cultivated niche means that caution should be exercised when discussing when and where agriculture was carried out on the Tibetan Plateau and with what permanence it was occupied. Disentangling how agricultural crops and pastoral animals spread onto and across the Tibetan Plateau requires not only better evidence and robust models upon which this evidence may be brought to bear but also more complex narratives to interpret the mismatch between archaeological data and models for human behavior.
backgroundCn: 生态因素对人类的影响可能非常大，特别是在高海拔地区，因为即使是温度、降水和土地覆盖的微小变化也会对可种植的作物产生重大影响。早期对小麦和大麦传播机制的研究考虑了作物生长模式的单一方面：生长季节的长度。特别是，基于作物累积热量需求（生长度日数，GDD）的模型预测，小麦和大麦比小米更适合在高纬度和高海拔的欧亚地区生长。因此，当地的生态和气候，加上作物的物候特征，对高海拔环境中作物的采用产生了显著影响，这与低地地区有很大不同。
research objectiveCn: 我们认为这个论点与大麦日益增长的需求不兼容。为了更好地建立关于高原占领复杂历史的模型，有必要清晰地定义过去的作物生态位。对NETP上大麦所占据的热生态位进行检查表明，在海拔4000米的高度种植大麦——这是Chen等人提出的主张——在平均年份中不太可能成功。
challengesCn: 猎人-采集者和牧民将谷物移出耕作区域的潜力意味着在讨论农业在青藏高原的开展时间、地点及其占据的持久性时应谨慎。理清农业作物和牧畜动物如何在青藏高原上扩散，需要不仅更好的证据和可以应用这些证据的稳健模型，还需要更复杂的叙事来解释考古数据与人类行为模型之间的不匹配。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is there a dataset that includes the distribution of prehistoric sites on the Tibetan Plateau and its surrounding areas?
Verification.QuestionCn: 是否有一个数据集包含青藏高原及其周边地区史前遗址的分布情况？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the specific challenges in data collection for high-altitude archaeological sites on the Tibetan Plateau?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原的高海拔考古遗址进行数据收集面临的具体挑战有哪些？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method for mapping archaeological site distributions in high-altitude regions like the Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，用于在高海拔地区如青藏高原上绘制考古遗址分布图？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method involves digitizing original data from cultural relic surveys and archaeological investigations to obtain geographic coordinates and elevations from distribution maps.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法涉及将文化遗物调查和考古调查的原始数据数字化，以从分布图中获取地理坐标和海拔高度。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge encountered when modeling the spread of agriculture, such as barley, in high-altitude regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 在高海拔地区建模农业（如大麦）传播时遇到的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge is the potential for both hunter-gatherers and pastoralists to move grains outside of the cultivated niche, complicating the determination of when and where agriculture was practiced on the Tibetan Plateau.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个挑战是狩猎采集者和牧民都有可能将谷物移出耕作区域，这使得确定农业在青藏高原何时何地被实践变得复杂。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a dataset that captures the distribution of prehistoric sites in an expansive and ecologically challenging area like the Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据集的示例，该数据集捕捉了像青藏高原这样一个广阔且生态挑战重重地区的史前遗址分布？
Example.AnswerEn: A dataset that captures such information includes geographic coordinates and elevations of 6950 archaeological sites, with a historical range from 7000BP to 2300BP and elevations between 850m and 5447m.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个包含此类信息的数据集包括6950个考古遗址的地理坐标和海拔，历史范围从7000年前到2300年前，海拔在850米到5447米之间。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the spatial distribution of prehistoric sites on the Tibetan Plateau and its surrounding regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 青藏高原及其周边地区史前遗址的空间分布特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 6950 sites, northern part of the plateau, 7000BP to 2300BP, elevations ranging from 850m to 5447m
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 6950个遗址，位于高原北部，距今7000年至2300年，海拔范围从850米到5447米。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What features of ecological constraints impact human settlement and agriculture in high-altitude environments?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 生态限制的哪些特征影响高海拔环境中的人类定居和农业？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: temperature, precipitation, land cover, growing degree days (GDD) model, wheat and barley adaptation, crop growth patterns
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 温度、降水、土地覆盖、积温模型、小麦和大麦适应性、作物生长模式

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What attributes are necessary to define past crop niches for better modeling of human occupation history on the Tibetan Plateau?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 定义过去作物生态位以更好地建模青藏 Plateau 上的人类占据历史所需的属性有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: thermal niche, growing feasibility at altitudes like 4000m above sea level
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 热生态位，在海拔4000米等高度的生长可行性。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many prehistoric sites are included in a dataset focusing on the distribution of archaeological sites on the Tibetan Plateau and its surrounding regions?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 该数据集中包含多少个关注于青藏 Plateau及其周边地区的考古遗址的史前遗址？

Quantification.QuestionEn: Over what time period do the archaeological sites in a dataset from the Tibetan Plateau region span?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 该数据集中来自青藏高原地区的考古遗址跨越了多长时间？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'map digitization' mean in the context of archaeological data collection on the Tibetan Plateau?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原考古数据收集中，“地图数字化”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Map digitization in this context refers to the process of converting information from historical and archaeological maps, such as those from the Qinghai and Tibet volumes of the Cultural Relics Atlas of China, into digital formats that include latitude, longitude, and elevation data.
Definition.AnswerCn: 地图数字化在此上下文中是指将历史和考古地图上的信息（例如来自《中国文物地图集》的青海和西藏卷）转换为数字格式的过程，包括纬度、经度和海拔数据。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the ecological constraints on crop growth in high-altitude environments relate to the challenges of accurately dating archaeological sites in these areas?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 高海拔环境中作物生长的生态限制与准确测定这些地区考古遗址年代的挑战之间有什么关系？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Ecological constraints affect crop growth due to temperature, precipitation, and land cover, which in turn influence human settlement patterns and agricultural practices. These factors can complicate dating archaeological sites, as they require consideration of both environmental conditions and human adaptation strategies, thus making the interpretation of dating results more complex.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 生态限制通过温度、降水和土地覆盖影响作物生长，这反过来又影响人类的定居模式和农业实践。这些因素可能会使考古遗址的年代测定变得复杂，因为它们需要考虑环境条件和人类适应策略，从而使年代测定结果的解释变得更加复杂。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the geographical distribution and altitudinal data of prehistoric sites on the Tibetan Plateau be interpreted to understand the migration and settlement patterns of early human populations?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 如何解读青藏高原上史前遗址的地理分布和海拔数据，以理解早期人类群体的迁徙和定居模式？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The geographical distribution and altitudinal data of prehistoric sites suggest that early human populations were likely influenced by ecological factors such as altitude and climate. These factors may have constrained agricultural practices and affected the spread of crops like wheat and barley, which are more suited to high-altitude environments. The distribution can provide insights into the adaptive strategies employed by early humans to survive in such harsh conditions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 史前遗址的地理分布和海拔数据表明，早期人类群体可能受到生态因素如海拔和气候的影响。这些因素可能限制了农业实践，并影响了像小麦和大麦这样的作物的传播，这些作物更适合高海拔环境。这种分布可以提供关于早期人类在如此恶劣条件下生存所采用的适应策略的见解。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in interpreting the spread of agricultural practices on the Tibetan Plateau based on available archaeological data?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 根据现有的考古数据，解释青藏高原农业实践的传播可能会面临哪些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Interpretation challenges include the potential movement of grains outside cultivated niches by hunter-gatherers and pastoralists, which complicates understanding the permanence and extent of agriculture in the region. Additionally, discrepancies between archaeological data and models for human behavior require more robust evidence and complex narratives to fully understand the agricultural spread.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 解释挑战包括猎人-采集者和牧民可能将谷物移动到耕作区域之外，这使得理解该地区农业的持久性和范围变得复杂。此外，考古数据与人类行为模型之间的差异需要更有力的证据和复杂的叙述，以全面理解农业的传播。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the difficulty of accurately mapping archaeological site distributions in high-altitude regions like the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 有哪些因素导致在像青藏高原这样的高海拔地区准确绘制考古遗址分布图变得困难？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Ecological factors such as temperature, precipitation, and land cover can heavily constrain human activities in high-altitude areas, which in turn affects the archaeological evidence available. These environmental challenges, coupled with the historical complexities of human adaptation and spread in these areas, contribute to the difficulty of accurately mapping site distributions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 生态因素如温度、降水和土地覆盖在高海拔地区对人类活动有很大限制，这反过来又影响了可用的考古证据。这些环境挑战，加上人类在这些地区适应和扩散的历史复杂性，导致准确绘制遗址分布的困难。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to develop more complex narratives and models to interpret the spread of agriculture on the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么有必要发展更复杂的叙事和模型来解释农业在青藏高原的传播？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The potential for both hunter-gatherers and pastoralists to move grains outside of cultivated niches necessitates more complex narratives and models. This complexity is required to address the mismatch between archaeological data and human behavior models, particularly in high-altitude environments where ecological and climatic factors markedly affect agricultural practices.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 猎人采集者和牧民将谷物移出耕作区域的潜力需要更复杂的叙述和模型。这种复杂性是为了应对考古数据与人类行为模型之间的不匹配，特别是在高海拔环境中，生态和气候因素显著影响农业实践。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the challenges in defining past crop niches on the Tibetan Plateau, especially regarding the cultivation of barley at high altitudes?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原上定义过去作物生态位的挑战是什么，特别是在高海拔地区种植大麦方面的挑战是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Challenges in defining past crop niches arise from the need to reconcile models with ecological realities, such as the thermal niche occupied by barley. Growing barley at high altitudes like 4000 m above sea level presents difficulties due to its growing requirements, and these challenges are compounded by variations in past climate and local ecological factors.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 定义过去作物生态位的挑战在于需要将模型与生态现实相结合，例如大麦所占据的热生态位。在海拔4000米等高海拔地区种植大麦面临困难，因为其生长要求较高，而这些挑战因过去气候和地方生态因素的变化而加剧。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of digitalizing archaeological site distribution maps for understanding prehistoric human activities on the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 数字化考古遗址分布图对理解青藏 Plateau 上的史前人类活动的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Digitalizing archaeological site distribution maps leads to obtaining precise geospatial data, such as longitude, latitude, and elevation, which are crucial for studying the spread and dynamics of prehistoric human activities in high-altitude regions like the Tibetan Plateau.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 数字化考古遗址分布图可以获得精确的地理空间数据，如经度、纬度和海拔，这对于研究高海拔地区（如青藏高原）史前人类活动的传播和动态至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives of collecting distribution data of prehistoric sites on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau and its surrounding areas?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集青藏高原及其周边地区史前遗址分布数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objectives include understanding the process and dynamics of prehistoric human expansion onto the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, which is crucial for studies related to the plateau's archaeology and prehistoric human activities.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标包括理解史前人类扩展到青藏高原的过程和动态，这对与高原考古学和史前人类活动相关的研究至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to define past crop niches when examining the history of agricultural occupation on the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在研究青藏高原农业占用历史时，定义过去的作物生态位是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Defining past crop niches is necessary to create better models for understanding the complex history of human occupation on the plateau, particularly regarding the growing requirements of crops like barley at high altitudes.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 定义过去的作物生态位对于创建更好的模型以理解高原上人类居住的复杂历史是必要的，特别是关于像大麦这样的作物在高海拔地区的生长要求。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What goals are addressed by examining the potential movement of grains outside cultivated niches in the context of the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在研究青藏高原的背景下，考察谷物在耕作区域外潜在移动的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goals include understanding when and where agriculture was carried out on the plateau, the permanence of human occupation, and the spread of agricultural crops and pastoral animals across this region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标包括了解高原上农业的开展时间和地点、人类居住的持久性，以及农业作物和牧畜动物在该地区的传播。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What processes are involved in digitizing and obtaining the geospatial coordinates and elevation data of prehistoric sites in the Tibetan Plateau region?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原地区，数字化和获取史前遗址的地理空间坐标和海拔数据涉及哪些过程？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The geospatial coordinates and elevation data of prehistoric sites in the Tibetan Plateau region were obtained through digitization of maps from the results of cultural heritage surveys and archaeological investigations, specifically using the atlas of cultural relics from Qinghai and Tibet sections.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 青藏高原地区史前遗址的地理坐标和海拔数据是通过数字化文化遗产调查和考古研究的地图获得的，具体使用了青海和西藏部分的文物图集。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can researchers address the challenges of distinguishing between the movement of agricultural crops and pastoral animals in the archaeological record on the Tibetan Plateau?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 研究人员如何应对在青藏高原考古记录中区分农业作物和牧畜动物移动的挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Researchers can address these challenges by developing robust models that incorporate both ecological and climatic data, as well as creating complex narratives to better interpret the archaeological data and human behavior models, acknowledging the potential for hunter-gatherers and pastoralists to move grains outside of cultivated niches.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 研究人员可以通过开发强大的模型来应对这些挑战，这些模型结合了生态和气候数据，并创建复杂的叙事，以更好地解释考古数据和人类行为模型，承认狩猎采集者和牧民有可能将谷物移出耕作区。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the necessary steps to accurately map and assess the distribution of prehistoric human activity sites in high-altitude regions like the Tibetan Plateau?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在高海拔地区如青藏高原准确绘制和评估史前人类活动遗址分布的必要步骤是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Accurate mapping and assessment involve gathering data from archaeological surveys, digitizing maps to obtain accurate geospatial data, and analyzing the distribution based on factors such as altitude, climate, and ecological constraints, as evidenced by the locations and altitudes of over 6,950 sites identified in the region.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 准确的制图和评估涉及从考古调查中收集数据，数字化地图以获取准确的地理空间数据，并根据海拔、气候和生态限制等因素分析分布，这一点在该地区识别出的超过6,950个遗址的位置和海拔中得到了证明。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges do researchers face when using archaeological data to model human behavior on the Tibetan Plateau, and how can these challenges be addressed?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 研究人员在使用考古数据来模拟青藏高原的人类行为时面临哪些挑战，以及如何应对这些挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Researchers face challenges in disentangling agricultural and pastoral influences on human behavior due to potential mismatches between archaeological evidence and existing models. Addressing these challenges requires the development of more robust models and complex narratives to better interpret the spread of crops and animals in high-altitude regions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 研究人员在解开农业和牧业对人类行为的影响时面临挑战，因为考古证据与现有模型之间可能存在不匹配。解决这些挑战需要开发更强大的模型和复杂的叙事，以更好地解释作物和动物在高海拔地区的传播。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might data collection methods for prehistoric site distribution on the Tibetan Plateau face challenges due to ecological factors?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 由于生态因素，为什么在青藏高原上收集史前遗址分布数据的方法可能会面临挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Ecological factors, such as high altitude and extreme environmental conditions, can heavily constrain human activity and impact the preservation and accessibility of archaeological sites. These factors can also influence the types of artifacts and evidence available, thereby complicating data collection efforts.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 生态因素，如高海拔和极端环境条件，可能严重限制人类活动，并影响考古遗址的保护和可达性。这些因素还可以影响可用的文物和证据类型，从而使数据收集工作变得复杂。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected difficulties in creating models for human occupation of the plateau when using datasets derived from archaeological surveys?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在使用来自考古调查的数据集创建人类在高原上居住模型时，预期会遇到哪些困难？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Creating models for human occupation of the plateau is challenging because there is often a mismatch between archaeological data and models for human behavior. This discrepancy can arise from the complexity of interpreting how agricultural crops and pastoral animals spread across the plateau, requiring more nuanced narratives and robust models to accurately reflect past human activities.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 创建高原人类占据模型是具有挑战性的，因为考古数据与人类行为模型之间常常存在不匹配。这种差异可能源于解释农业作物和牧畜动物如何在高原上扩散的复杂性，这需要更细致的叙述和更强有力的模型，以准确反映过去的人类活动。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might it be necessary to redefine past crop niches in datasets related to prehistoric human activities on the Tibetan Plateau?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在与青藏高原史前人类活动相关的数据集中，重新定义过去的作物生态位可能是必要的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Redefining past crop niches is necessary because existing models may not accurately represent the thermal conditions required for successful crop growth at high altitudes. For example, growing barley at an altitude of 4000 m above sea level may not have been feasible in an average year, indicating that past models need refinement to better understand the historical agricultural practices and settlement patterns on the plateau.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 重新定义过去的作物生态位是必要的，因为现有模型可能无法准确表示高海拔地区成功作物生长所需的热条件。例如，在海拔4000米的地方种植大麦在平均年份可能并不可行，这表明过去的模型需要改进，以更好地理解高原上的历史农业实践和定居模式。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using archaeological surveys and digital mapping techniques to create comprehensive datasets for prehistoric site distribution in high-altitude regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用考古调查和数字制图技术在高海拔地区创建史前遗址分布综合数据集的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Digital mapping techniques combined with archaeological surveys offer a robust approach to documenting prehistoric site distributions, especially in challenging high-altitude regions like the Tibetan Plateau. They enable precise location data collection, including coordinates and elevation, which are crucial for understanding human settlement patterns in these areas.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 数字制图技术与考古调查相结合，为记录史前遗址分布提供了一种强有力的方法，特别是在像青藏高原这样的高海拔地区。它们能够精确收集位置信息，包括坐标和海拔，这对于理解这些地区的人类定居模式至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What potential do you see for expanding current datasets to better model the spread of agriculture and pastoralism across the Tibetan Plateau, considering past ecological and cultural contexts?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 考虑到过去的生态和文化背景，您认为扩展当前数据集以更好地模拟农业和畜牧业在青藏高原的传播有何潜力？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Expanding current datasets could involve integrating climatic and ecological data with archaeological findings to create more detailed models of agricultural and pastoral spread. Exploring interactions between local ecological niches and human adaptation strategies would provide a deeper understanding of how these activities evolved in the past, despite the challenging environment.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 扩展当前数据集可能涉及将气候和生态数据与考古发现整合，以创建更详细的农业和牧业传播模型。探索地方生态位与人类适应策略之间的相互作用，将提供对这些活动如何在过去的艰难环境中演变的更深入理解。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of the challenges faced in confirming the permanence of agriculture on the Tibetan Plateau.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解确认青藏高原农业永久性所面临的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Confirming the permanence of agriculture is challenging due to the potential movement of grains outside cultivated niches by hunter-gatherers and pastoralists. This requires better evidence and robust models to disentangle how crops and animals spread across the plateau.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 确认农业的持久性是具有挑战性的，因为猎人-采集者和牧民可能会将谷物移出耕作区域。这需要更好的证据和稳健的模型，以理清作物和动物在高原上的传播方式。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore and summarize data collection methods that could be used to digitize archaeological site distributions, focusing on high-altitude regions like the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨并总结可以用于数字化考古遗址分布的数据收集方法，重点关注像青藏高原这样的高海拔地区。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Data collection methods for digitizing archaeological site distributions in high-altitude regions such as the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau involve the digitization of archaeological survey results and cultural relic maps. This includes obtaining geographic coordinates and elevations of sites through map digitization, which were originally derived from archaeological surveys and relic census results, such as those documented in the cultural relic atlas of Qinghai and Tibet.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在高海拔地区如青藏高原，数字化考古遗址分布的数据收集方法包括对考古调查结果和文物地图的数字化。这包括通过地图数字化获取遗址的地理坐标和海拔，这些数据最初来源于考古调查和文物普查结果，例如青海和西藏的文物图集中记录的内容。
